title: 1/bd 1/ba, Easy access to public transportation, Renovated unit
posting_body: Embrace classic comfort and contemporary style at 3300 Tamarac Apartments, in Denver's Hampden neighborhood.
Our collection of refined studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments offer you a place to rest, relax, and have a little fun.
From our relaxed modern style and upscale social spaces to chic interiors, youll be ready to unwind in no time.

Energy efficient appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher                                                                                                                                select units                                                                                                                                Featured amenity
Landscaped courtyards and ponds with outdoor seating
Resident social lounge with demonstration kitchen and billiards table
Wood-style plank flooring in kitchen and living areas
Ceiling fans in living areas and bedrooms
